faq.item1.question: I made a purchase through WeShare but did not receive any notification. So does it mean I can donate?
faq.item1.answer: Don't worry, your donation will be recorded within 24 hours of your purchase. We will notify you when your order is successfully received. So turn on notifications from WeShare!
faq.item2.question: Why can't I donate? The status keeps being AWAITING
faq.item2.answer: Every month, we'll check with the brand you shopped and update your donation status to CONFIRMED. Once the donations are successfully transferred to the organization, they will be updated to DONATED.
faq.item3.question: Do I have to pay any extra for my purchases?
faq.item3.answer: No, you don't have to pay any extra cost. Just open WeShare, choose the site you want and place your order as always.
